definition: literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)

sentences.english: Chapter three explores how to lead the primary school language teaching into the local culture of study in primary schools.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探究了小学语文教学引入如东地方文化的实践。

sentences.english: Then, the language teaching can the whole innovation.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样，语文教学才能整体立异。

sentences.english: The third part studies the use of Language Elective high school textbooks published by People's Education Press.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是人教版高中语文选修教材的使用研究。

sentences.english: The core of language quality is language sense.
sentences.chinese: 语文素质的核心是语感。

sentences.english: Itsymbolizes one kind of ideal boundary of the language curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 它标志着语文课程的一种理想境界。

sentences.english: However, it is still serious that Chinese classroom teaching is inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 然而当前语文课堂教学效率低下现象依然严重。

sentences.english: Strongly appeal on the change in the role of primary school teachers in curriculum innovation.
sentences.chinese: 新课改对小学语文教师角色转变的呼唤异常强烈。

sentences.english: At present, the theory of the Chinese subject have the newchanges.
sentences.chinese: 目前，语文学科教学理念有了新的变革。

sentences.english: High school Chinese classroom to raise teaching of reviewing etc. teaching quality of Chinese there is a great meaning.
sentences.chinese: 高中语文课堂反思性教学对提高教学质量有重大意义。

sentences.english: College Chinese teaching plays a most important role in this way.
sentences.chinese: 而大学语文在人才培养方面具有得天独厚的优势。

sentences.english: As the teacher , should pay attention to the exploration of lesson teaching of Chinese activity and practise .
sentences.chinese: 作为教师，应重视语文活动课教学的探索和实践。

sentences.english: In Chinese, often with text content impromptu performance figures.
sentences.chinese: 语文课上，常常即兴配合课文内容进行人物表演。

sentences.english: So the Chinese teaching with multi-media aids in primary school still needs to fo…
sentences.chinese: 所以，多媒体辅助语文教学需以人为本。

sentences.english: Liu Guozheng's Chinese life view has a far-reaching impact on new course of Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 刘国正语文生活观对语文新课程产生深远的影响。

sentences.english: Liu Guozheng's Chinese life view has a far-reaching impact on new course of Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 刘国正语文生活观对语文新课程产生深远的影响。

sentences.english: This has manifested the language phatic function fully.
sentences.chinese: 这充分体现了语文的交际功能。
